hero.badge: For Women Wey Dey Do Business
hero.title: Make Your Business Strong
hero.subtitle: Simple, strong tools for women wey dey hustle. Track money, grow sales, build your money future.
hero.description: You work hard. You provide. You plan for tomorrow with what little you have today. At SheBalance, we see you. That's why we created a platform just for you — to help you take charge of your money, grow your business, and build the future you've always dreamed of.

about.title: Wetin Be SheBalance?
about.description: It's your financial companion. Your silent business partner. Your daily reminder that you deserve more — more knowledge, more control, more confidence.

features.trackBusiness: Track Your Business, Your Own Way
features.trackBusinessDesc: Whether you sell in the market, run a small shop, or hustle from home, SheBalance helps you keep track of every naira. No need for fancy accounting — just a few taps, and you're in charge.
features.builtForYou: We Build Am For You, By Women Wey Understand
features.builtForYouDesc: Designed with women like you in mind, SheBalance speaks your language — literally. With local language options, simple icons, and voice instructions, it's easy for every woman to feel confident using it.
features.knowNumbersDesc: No more guessing where your money went. See what's coming in, what's going out, and what's left to save. SheBalance shows you the full picture — so you can make smarter choices.
features.learnEarn: Learn As You Dey Make Money
features.learnEarnDesc: You don't need a classroom to grow. SheBalance shares small, powerful lessons on saving, planning, and business tips — right inside the app, as you use it. Every day, you grow stronger.

whoFor.title: Who SheBalance Dey For?
whoFor.subtitle: SheBalance is for you, the woman who:
whoFor.item1: Runs her business with heart and hustle
whoFor.item2: Wants to prepare for bigger opportunities like loans and investments
whoFor.item3: Dreams of being organized, informed, and independent
whoFor.item4: Believes she can grow — with the right tools by her side

appFeatures.title: Wetin You Fit Do With SheBalance
appFeatures.getReports: Get reports you can download and share
appFeatures.useOffline: Use the app offline — anytime, anywhere
appFeatures.localLanguage: Enjoy support in your local language

faq.title: Questions Wey People Dey Ask
faq.subtitle: Everything wey you need to know about SheBalance
faq.a1: SheBalance is a mobile platform designed specifically for women entrepreneurs to track their business finances, manage inventory, join savings groups, and build financial confidence. It's built with local languages and simple interfaces to make financial management accessible to every woman.
faq.a2: Yes! SheBalance offers a free tier with essential features to help you get started. We also offer premium features for advanced business needs. You can start with the free version and upgrade when you're ready.
faq.q3: I fit use SheBalance without internet?
faq.a3: Absolutely! SheBalance works offline, so you can track your sales and expenses even without internet connection. Your data will sync when you're back online.
faq.a4: SheBalance supports multiple local languages to ensure every woman can use the app comfortably. We're constantly adding more languages based on user needs.
faq.a5: Your data security is our top priority. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your financial information. Your data is private and secure.
faq.a6: Yes! You can download and share your financial reports. This is especially useful for loan applications, business planning, or sharing with family members.
faq.q7: I no sabi technology well. I fit still use am?
faq.a7: Don't worry! SheBalance is designed to be simple and intuitive. We use familiar icons, voice instructions, and step-by-step guidance to make it easy for everyone to use.
faq.q8: How I go join savings group?
faq.a8: You can join existing savings groups or create your own. The app helps you track contributions, set goals, and manage group savings transparently and securely.

cta.title: Your Money. Your Power. Your Future.
cta.description1: At SheBalance, we believe that when a woman understands her money, she multiplies her power — in her business, her family, and her community.
cta.description2: So whether you're buying, selling, saving, or just starting out — let SheBalance walk with you.

footer.description: Empowering women entrepreneurs with simple tools to track money, grow businesses, and build financial confidence.

newsletter.title: Stay up to date
newsletter.description: Get tips and updates delivered to your inbox.
